lead_paragraph: ZEFF--Leon H.,Ph.D., died in Oakland, CA. Formerly of Westport, CT, he was born and raised in St. Paul, MN, enlisted in the Army Air Corp, and served in India and Burma. Earned a B.A and M.A. from NYU and a doctorate in psychology from Adelphi University. Son of Jennie and Abe Zeff, youngest brother of Dave, Milton and William, all of whom predecease him. Father of Carl Douglass, Jonathan S. and Joshua Adam Zeff. Grandfather of Jennifer Chan and Daren Chan. Husband of Norma Eisendorf for 67 years. Died of complications of Parkinson's disease. Memorial contributions may be made to The Southern Poverty Law Center or Doctors without Borders in his honor. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  ZEFF, LEON H.
